Waliet

Bank Your Time

A talent marketplace for Whop communities

List your time for sale at an hourly rate. Others purchase hours and book sessions. Hours are held in a wallet until redeemed through verified sessions.

  • →One rate per person — no complex pricing
  • →Hours as assets — no expiration, hold until ready
  • →Verified delivery — sessions tracked end-to-end
  • →Community-native — built for Whop

Built on Whop payment infrastructure
